content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When end-users close their requests estimating the provided service with the lowest or highest rate, they are offered an option to create either a complaint or a compliment by clicking the respective checkbox below their rate and typing a comment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about assignment of such requests and their processing in article “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/LU6uFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"User complaints and compliments\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
